    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Specified by:
        toString in class Cell

      • process

        public void process(Hunter h)
        When a hunter aims to this cell, his direction is reversed and he is not moved

        If after reversing, the Hunter still aims to a CellSide (e.g. he is in a corner), his position is changed until he doesn't aims to a CellSide

        Parameters:
        h - the Model.Hunter to process
